title: Tank Storage Magazine Spring 2025
author: Tank Storage Magazine Follow this publisher
text: Tank Storage Magazine's Spring edition and official StocExpo edition is here! Dive in for exclusive features, including: - Insightful interview with key figures from Liquin's Botlek Terminal ahead of the tour at StocExpo - LBC's Anne Been shares her story as a Woman in Tanks - A deep dive into the EU's pivotal Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM) - Insight into how FuelEU Maritime regulations are going to impact storage terminals - Technical articles covering essential topics such as fire protection, emissions control, and the role of digitalisation Plus loads more inside!
